item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic: Ralaxation

Hypnosis is often used to induce relaxation to calm stress and anxiety.  This evening we will experience hypnotic trance in several ways to learn to relax.

 

 

Kevin Kevin Martin NLP Master Practitioner, Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington- Relaxation
